alert.note: Alert for Duplin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 02 at 9:59AM EDT until September 05 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina... Northeast Cape Fear River Near Chinquapin affecting Duplin County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Northeast Cape Fear River Near Chinquapin. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Low land flooding adjacent to the river and its tributaries is expected. River access docks are impacted as well. At 15.0 feet, Secondary roads adjacent to the river flood and may be impassable. Tributaries that drain into the river flood secondary roads. Water surrounds homes and properties in the River Landing community in Wallace. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 14.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM EDT Saturday was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning and continue falling to 10.0 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps. The next statement will be issued late tonight by 100 AM EDT.
